Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the line of succession for the office of governor; repealer
Summary: Relates to the line of succession for the office of governor when the governor is impeached or unable to perform such governor's duties.
LawCode: Add ยง44, Pub Off L; rpld Art 1-A, Chap 784 of 1951
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to the line of succession to the office of governor; and to repeal article 1-A of the New York state defense emergency act relating thereto
